mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, stock_quantity, category_id, image_url) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stockQuantity}, #{categoryId}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.id as cat_id, c.name as cat_name, c.description as cat_description FROM products p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT p.*, c.id as cat_id, c.name as cat_name, c.description as cat_description FROM products p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.*, c.id as cat_id, c.name as cat_name, c.description as cat_description FROM products p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.*, c.id as cat_id, c.name as cat_name, c.description as cat_description FROM products p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity}, category_id = #{categoryId}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = #{quantity}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
